title: MAJOR BUG - Changing Summoner Icon will make it IMPOSSIBLE TO CLOSE

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: From the picture you can tell, that i actually cant close the summoner icon box, after changing and clicking save, i tried to repeat this process but it didnt work, Riot please consider this and look into it. :)

replies.body:
it works now but im worried that it might happen again in the alpha client, i just made this post because it made me dodge a ranked q

at the time nothing would work to close the summoner icon window, but after re-logging it worked again.

Hey there,

From what I can tell, clicking save should automatically close that menu panel.

Are you still experiencing this issue?
